name: My Reflection (caramellesweets)
description:
Academic Thesis Project 

Just a small, short little game for my thesis project for school. It is a piece dedicated to all my family and friends. Enjoy!~

Summary: 

My Reflection is a short, top-down, 2D pixel animated exploration game about a student navigating through her struggles of anxiety and having too many assignment deadlines. 

The player will play as Luna, a young girl struggling with too much on her plate, is on a journey to the library to find an all-answers book in order to solve all her problems at once. However, finding such a book is not easy and often comes with a catch. Luna must first explore and interact with the world around her if she so desperately needs those answers post-haste. 

It is my first time working with the Godot Engine, making a game, and programming. Please accept my apologies for any bugs or issues :) 

Controls: 

To move: Arrow Keys, WASD 

To Interact: F, Space, Enter, Mouse-Controls 

Download Instructions: 

Please download the ZIP folder and extract it. Afterwards, run the application :)
